title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.26 - Amendment of pleading other than petition; amendment to conform to proof
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.26 - Amendment of pleading other than petition; amendment to conform to proof

State Regulations
(a) Pleadings, other than petitions, may only be amended with the Board's
permission. (b) Pleadings may be
amended with the Board's permission to conform to the proof at any time prior
to the conclusion of the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.26

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
